# Marcin Jasion - Pragmatic DevOps

> Personal blog and portfolio of Marcin Jasion, a DevOps engineer writing about cloud infrastructure, Kubernetes, and software development.

## About

Marcin Jasion is a DevOps engineer based in Warsaw, Poland. This site contains technical blog posts, notes, and a professional portfolio.

- Website: https://mjasion.pl
- GitHub: https://github.com/mjasion
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/marcinjasion

## Blog Posts

- [How to enable debug and trace logs in Terraform Cloud and Enterprise](https://mjasion.pl/posts/cloud/how-to-enable-debug-in-terraform-cloud/)
- [How to configure parallelism in Terraform Cloud](https://mjasion.pl/posts/cloud/how-to-set-parallelism-in-terraform-cloud/)
- [How to setup AWS Site-to-Site VPN with Unifi UDM](https://mjasion.pl/posts/cloud/how-to-setup-aws-site-to-site-vpn-with-unifi-udm/)
- [How to debug Istio Upstream Reset 502 UPE](https://mjasion.pl/posts/kubernetes/how-to-debug-istio-upstream-reset/)
- [Implementing Leader Election in Golang using Kubernetes API](https://mjasion.pl/posts/kubernetes/implementing-leader-election-in-go-using-kubernetes-api/)
- [How to label GitLab notification in Gmail by headers](https://mjasion.pl/posts/development/label-gitlab-notifications/)
- [Deploy your first blockchain contract to Ethereum](https://mjasion.pl/posts/development/first-blockchain-contract/)
- [Why I'm Choosing Cloudflare and TanStack for My Side Projects](https://mjasion.pl/posts/development/why-i-chose-cloudflare-and-tanstack/)

## Topics

Cloud (AWS, Terraform), Kubernetes (Istio, Leader Election), Golang, DevOps, Automation, Blockchain, Frontend Development
